game.title: Commenting Feature Demo
game.tags: demo, debug, disable, commenting, comment, iteration
game.instructions:
Each of the two included scenes shows a different demonstration of Commenting behaviors.
Please look inside of the Flower and Tank actors (named READ ME FIRST and READ ME SECOND) for further details and instructions.
game.longDescription:
This demo shows various ways you can comment behaviors and entire groups or rulesets in and out for many different results.
Commenting behaviors in and out will allow for a smoother testing and debugging process, as well as allow you to prototype more freely and efficiently.
